creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: gold is intact; maroon velvet; coat dress with very deep side vents and very long rented sleeves, lined in dark rose satin; heavy embroidery throughout in floral motifs; front edge and vents have elaborate silver edging; stand-up collar; underarm gussets
medium: Silk, metallic threads, metal sequins; needlework
title: Wedding Dress
